author: @4ian
description:
Manage health (life) and shield points of an object. Health can be assigned to players, enemies, NPCs, or even inanimate objects such as breaking doors and mining rocks.

How to use:

- Set desired values in "Health" and "Shield" behavior properties
- To apply damage use “Damage an object” or “Damage an object protected by a shield”
- To heal health, use “Heal object” action 
- To activate the shield, use “Activate Shield” action
- Health and shield regeneration will happen automatically based on properties
 
Tips:

- While damage cooldown is active, no damage will be applied to health or shield
- Try using the “Blink” extension while damage cooldown is active
- Use the “Is just damaged” condition to trigger audio and visual effects

Health properties:

- Health (life points) Used for starting health
- Maximum health (0 for no maximum)
- Damage cooldown (seconds) Use "0" for no cooldown
- Rate of health regeneration (points per second) Will not exceed max health, even with overhealing enabled
- Delay (seconds) before health regeneration starts after being hit
- Allow heal to increase health above max health (will not exceed max health)

Shield properties:

- Max shield points (Shield will start with this many points when activated)
- Duration of shield (seconds) Use "0" to disable shield timer
- Rate of shield regeneration (points per second)
- Shield will block all excess damage when shield is destroyed
- Delay (seconds) before shield regeneration starts after being hit
- Regenerate shield when it has zero points
name: Health
shortDescription: Manage life points and a protective shield.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Manage health (life) points by damaging and healing the object.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Health

events.comment: Health
Correct any values above maximum limits

eventsFunctions.description: Apply damage directly to the object. Damage will not be affected by shield. Triggers damage cooldown.
eventsFunctions.name: Hit
eventsFunctions.sentence: Damage _PARAM0_, removing _PARAM2_ points from its health

events.comment: Only consider damage if damage cooldown is NOT active
Mark object was hit at least once (used for initial state of damage cooldown)
Restart time since last hit timer
Apply damage

parameters.description: Value of the damage to do (will be removed from object health)
parameters.name: DamageValue

eventsFunctions.description: Change health points. This is not considered damage.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHealth
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set health of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points

eventsFunctions.description: Heal the object by increasing its life points.
eventsFunctions.name: Heal
eventsFunctions.sentence: Heal _PARAM0_ with _PARAM2_ health points

events.comment: Change health points
Prevent exceeding max health (unless overhealing is enabled)

parameters.description: Points to heal (will be added to object health)
parameters.name: HealValue

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Protective shield that prevents damage to health points.

events.comment: Shield
Only regen when shield is active or when "RegenShieldWhenZeroPoints" is enabled
Correct any values above maximum limits

events.name: Remove shield points if shield expired

eventsFunctions.description: Apply damage to shield and object. If shield is active, it will be damaged first.
eventsFunctions.name: ShieldHit
eventsFunctions.sentence: Damage shielded object _PARAM0_ for _PARAM2_ points of damage

events.comment: Only consider damage if damage cooldown is NOT active
Mark object was hit at least once (used for initial state of damage cooldown)
Restart time since last hit timer
If shield is NOT active, perform normal damage
If shield is active, damage shield first
Excess damage is based on negative shield points
Apply excess damage only if shield does NOT block excess damage

parameters.description: Value of the damage to do (will be removed from object health)
parameters.name: DamageValue
